name: Prototype Danganronpa
description:
just for me to practice using renpy and to learn how to publish games on itch.

sprites used are official danganronpa sprites of character kirigiri and komaeda (except for the sprite cranberry one, i believe this is the original creator but feel free to correct me if wrong https://www.reddit.com/r/danganronpa/comments/a71bpp/28_daily_danganronpa_character_holding_a_sprite/)

title screen background is a minecraft screenshot; game backgrounds are the "you know i had to do it to em" meme, a loser stamp stock image, and the homestuck ball pit

music is isabelle singing, legend of zelda twilight princess game over, and animal crossing 1 am ost

writing done by me

the screenshots arent from the actual game, they're from when i was developing it.

again, i dont plan on making profit or clout or whatever off of this, it's just a learning experience for me. and i learned that i suck at coding (hence why i didnt edit the gui that much and i uploaded it as a .zip file instead of a packaged thing)
